dm:bugtracker.dm:product: SAP S/4 HANA - Enqueue Replication 2 High Availability Cluster with Simple Mount - Setup Guide

productname: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications
meta: SAP S/4 HANA - Enqueue Replication 2 High Availability Cluster With Simple Mount
This document explains how to deploy an S/4 HANA Enqueue Replication 2 High Availability Cluster solution.
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15

abstract.para: SUSEÂ® Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications is optimized in various ways for SAP* applications. This document explains how to deploy an S/4 HANA Enqueue Replication 2 High Availability Cluster solution. It is based on SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15. The concept however can also be used with newer service packs of SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications.
